content: As an AI language model, I do not have personal experiences or emotions, but I can tell you that some recent films that have been praised for their soundtracks include A Star is Born (2018), which features original songs performed by Lady Gaga and Bradley Cooper, and Guardians of the Galaxy (2014), which has a classic rock soundtrack that plays a key role in the storyline. Other films with memorable soundtracks include Baby Driver (2017), La La Land (2016), and the musical biopic Bohemian Rhapsody (2018), which features songs from the iconic British rock band Queen.
